title: Random Circle Generator
desc: Watch circles float around the screen randomly. Create circles using a create cricle button, also use auto create circle button and a summon cats button!

title: RPS spinner
desc: Change the rotatons per second on this awesome spinner with a gradient box around it. Also watch the square on the side, as both the line and square make unique shapes the faster you spin it.

title: Grof the Frog
desc: Watch a horrible quality frog image jump up and down. Adjust its speed, make it do backflips, and watch it dance!

title: Ripple Machine
desc: Click on the screen and summon ripples where you can customize colors, ripple fill, summon cats, and ripple expansion speed!

title: Line summoner
desc: Summon Lines that can change color, randomize, and more (spinning lines too!)

title: Simple Platformer
desc: Simple platformer, somewhat difficult, has climbing / wall jump, gravity, jumping, and other basic movements/mechanics. (NOT MOBILE COMPATIABLE)

title: Graph Creator
desc: More of a tool than a random program, inferior to many other graph creation programs, however it's still pretty dynamic. Just create graphs for fun.

title: Spray Paint
desc: Simple Spray Paint Machine, very dynamic and easy to use with multiple commands. Includes a draw mode and a remove all paint button.
